game.name: Dragon Gate: Tournament
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Compete in short, deadly sprints full of power-ups, dangers and fierce rivalries where only speed and skill mean survival. Are you ready to take the crown?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Compete in short, deadly sprints full of power-ups, dangers and fierce rivalries where only speed and skill mean survival. Are you ready to take the crown?
